concepts.SYSTOLIC_BLOOD_PRESSURE_4_DESC: A patient's systolic blood pressure measurement (taken with a manual cuff in either a sitting or standing position)
concepts.DIASTOLIC_BLOOD_PRESSURE_5_DESC: A patient's diastolic blood pressure measurement (taken with a manual cuff in either a sitting or standing position)
concepts.BODY_MASS_INDEX_6_DESC:
Body Mass Index (BMI) is a relationship between weight and height that is associated with body fat and health risk.

The equation is BMI = body weight in kilograms/height in meters squared.
